pattern_name: Mushroom Medley Crochet and Cross Stitch Trivet
materials: Lily® Sugar’n Cream® (2.5 oz/71 g; 120 yds/109 m) Main Color (MC) Seabreeze (01201) 1 ball or 48 yds/44 m
Contrast A Tangerine (01699) 1 ball or 15 yds/14 m
Contrast B Ecru (00004) 1 ball or 11 yds/10 m
Size U.S. H/8 (5 mm) Susan Bates® Silvalume® crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge
Susan Bates® yarn needle
measurements: Approx 6 ½" x 9 ¾" [16.5 x 25 cm].
instructions:
With MC, ch 22.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 
1 sc in each ch to end of ch. Turn. 
21 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to 
end of row. Turn.
Rep 2nd row until 34 rows total 
worked.
Fasten off.
With A and B, cross stitch 
Mushroom motif following Chart. 
Each square of chart equals 1 
single crochet.

materials: Caron® One Pound™ (16 oz/453.6 g; 812 yds/742 m) Main Color (MC) Off White (10514) 1 ball
Caron® x Pantone™ (3.5 oz/100 g; 127 yds/116 m) Contrast A to E Blushing Coral (01033) 1 braid
Contrast F Dane Gray (01003) 1 braid
Size U.S. H/8 (5 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Stitch marker.
Tapestry needle.
14" x 24" (35.5 x 61 cm) pillow form.
gauge: 12 sc and 13 rows = 4" [10 cm] with Caron® One Pound™.
instructions:
Notes:
• Before working with  Caron® x Pantone™ yarn braid, separate each link and wind into 5 separate balls for each braid.
• Each color link will be  referenced by its Pantone # (see label).
• Designate each different shade of the 5 separate yarn balls as Contrast A, B, C, D and E as noted. 
FRONT and BACK (make alike)
With MC, ch 74.
1st row:  (RS). Working into horizontal "bump" at back of each ch, 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 73 sc.

2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn. 
Rep last row until work from beg measures 14" [35.5 cm], ending on a RS row. Fasten off.
FINISHING
Cross Stitch Embroidery:  Measure approx 4¾" [12 cm] down from top of Front and mark center st. Line up marked st with center stitch of chart and work cross stitch embroidery using A, B, C, D, E and F yarn. Each square of chart represents 1 sc.

Joining Front and Back:  With MC and WS facing, sew 3 sides tog. Insert pillow form. Sew rem side closed.

materials: Lily® Sugar’n Cream® (2.5 oz/70.9 g; 120 yds/109 m)
Main Color (MC) Soft Ecru (01004) 3 balls or 300 yds/274.5 m
Contrast A Hot Green (01712) 1 ball or 5 yds/4.5 m
Contrast B Hot Pink (01740) 1 ball or 5 yds/4.5 m
Contrast C Hot Purple (01317) 1 ball or 5 yds/4.5 m
Size U.S. E/4 (3.5 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Yarn needle.
instructions:
Sides 
With MC, ch 28.
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from 
hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of 
chain. Turn. 27 sc.
2nd row:  Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to 
end of row. Turn.
Rep last row until work from beg 
measures 5" [12.5 cm], ending on 
a WS row. 
Next row:  (RS). (Fold line). Ch 1. 
Working in back loops only, 1 sc in 
each sc to end of row. Turn. 
***Next row:  Ch 1. Working in both 
loops, 1 sc in each sc to end of row. 
Turn. 
Rep last row until work from last 
fold line measures 10" [25.5 cm], 
ending on a WS row.***
Next row:  (RS). (Fold line). Ch 1. 
Working in back loops only, 1 sc in 
each sc to end of row. Turn. 
Next row:  Ch 1. Working in both 
loops, 1 sc in each sc to end of row. 
Turn.
Rep last row until work from last 
fold line measures 5" [12.5 cm], 
ending on a WS row. 
Rep from *** to *** once more. 
Next row:  (RS). (Joining row). 
Place foundation ch behind last 
row with WS of work tog. Ch 1. 
Working through both thicknesses, 
1 sc in each sc across. Fasten off. 
Base 
Ch 46.
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from 
hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of 
chain. Turn. 45 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to 
end of row. Turn. 
Rep last row until work from beg 
measures 5" [12.5 cm], ending with 
a WS row. Do not fasten off. 
Join Base to Sides:  Place lower 
edge of Sides behind Base with 
WS of work tog, aligning corners 
of Base with fold lines and joining 
row of Sides. 
Next rnd:  (RS). Ch 1. Working 
through both thicknesses,  work 1 
rnd of sc around all 4 sides of Base. 
Join with sl st in first sc. Fasten off. 
FINISHING
Fold over sides of Basket to form 
a Brim as shown in photo. Placing 
chart slightly offset from center 
(see photo), cross stitch floral motif 
on Brim of Basket.

pattern_name: CROCHET FLORAL CROSS STITCH TOTE BAG
materials: Caron® Colorama™ O’Go™ (6.4 oz/180 g; 228 yds/208 m) Main Color (MC) Sticky Rice (68024) 2 O’Gos
Contrast A, B, C, D and E: Baja (68013) 1 O’Go
Size U.S. J/10 (6 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Yarn needle.
instructions:
Notes:
• To begin working with the O’Go format, carefully cut plastic tie where the ends of the O’Go meet.
• Pull tie to remove.
• Colors can be easily separated by gently pulling apart and cutting at the color transition.
• Each color is ready to use.
Side Panels (make 2 alike)
With MC, ch 8.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 7 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Rep 2nd row until 44 rows in total are complete.
Fasten off.
Bottom
With MC, ch 8.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 7 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Rep 2nd row until work from beg measures 17" [43 cm].
Fasten off.
Bag Front and Back Panels (make 2 alike)
With MC, ch 45.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 44 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Rep 2nd row until 44 rows in total are complete.
Fasten off.
Cross Stitch Embroidery
Noting chart placement is 1 row up from bottom and 1 st in from sides, cross stitch floral motif on Front of Tote. Each square of chart equals 1 single crochet stitch.
Join Panels:
Arrange Panels to form a box, having Side Panels opposite each other. With WS of 2 Panels tog, join MC with sl st to top left corner. Ch 1. Working through both thicknesses, work sc evenly along side edge. Fasten off.
Rep for rem Panels.
Join Bottom to Panels:
With RS of Bottom facing, place lower edge of joined Panels behind Bottom with WS of work tog, aligning corner of Bottom with joining rows of Panels. Join MC with sl st.
1st rnd: Ch 1. Working through both thicknesses, work sc evenly around all 4 sides of Bottom. Join with sl st to first sc. Fasten off.
Straps (worked lengthwise - make 2 alike)
With MC, ch 56.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. Turn. 55 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Rep 2nd row until Strap measures 2" [5 cm].
Fasten off.
Sew Straps 1" [2.5 cm] down from top edge and 3" [7.5 cm] in from sides to WS of Bag.

materials: Lily® Sugar’n Cream® (2.5 oz/70.9 g; 120 yds/109 m) Main Color (MC) Ecru (00004) 1 ball or 109 yds/100 m
Contrast A Wine (00015) 1 ball or 27 yds/25 m
Contrast B Country Red (01530) 1 ball or 66 yds/60 m
Contrast C Tangerine (01699) 1 ball or 66 yds/60 m
Size U.S. G/6 (4 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Yarn needle.
instructions:
With MC, ch 42.
1st row: (RS). 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of chain. 41 sc. Turn.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Rep 2nd row 40 times more. Fasten off.
FINISHING
Using cross st, embroider Chart on RS of Dishcloth (See Chart on page 2).
Edging: 1st rnd: With RS facing, join C with sl st in bottom left corner. Ch 1. 3 sc in same sp as sl st. Work 1 rnd of sc evenly around, having 3 sc in each corner. Join A with sl st to first sc. Break C.
2nd rnd: With A, ch 1. Working from left to right instead of from right to left as usual, work 1 reverse sc in each sc around. Fasten off.

pattern_name: Crochet Mushroom Cross Stitch Blanket Block
materials: Red Heart® Super Saver® (5 oz/141g; 236 yds/215 m) Main Color (MC) Green Tones (0629) 1 ball or 59 yds/54 m
Red Heart® Super Saver® (7 oz/198 g; 364 yds/333 m) Contrast A Cherry Red (0319) 1 ball or 7.5 yds/7 m
Contrast B Aran (0313) 1 ball or 7.5 yds/7 m
Size U.S. I/9 (5.5 mm) crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge.
Yarn needle.
instructions:
With MC, ch 22.
1st row: 1 sc in 2nd ch from hook. 1 sc in each ch to end of ch. Turn. 21 sc.
2nd row: Ch 1. 1 sc in each sc to end of row. Turn.
Rep 2nd row until 34 rows total worked.
Fasten off.
With A and B, cross stitch Mushroom motif following Chart. Each square of chart equals 1 single crochet.
